div.sent: He put the bird in a cage.
The hunter had a girl named Chandrima.
She gave the bird in the cage water and food everyday.
She took good care of the bird.
But the bird was not happy at all.
After a few days the bird gave up eating.
Chandrima became sad.
She could understand the sorrows of the bird.
She could realise that the bird was not at all happy in the cage.
She also realise that if the bird was set free, it would be happy again.
It started flying happily in the sky.
We understand from the story that in captivity the bird was not happy at all.
We saw how delighted the bird was when it was free.
Being free from the cage, it flew away in the sky happily.
Like this bird, we also want to be happy.
None of us want to lead a captive or unhappy life.
We all want to get the joys of freedom.
Human beings were sunk in the ocean of sins.
So they needed a saviour.
Chandrima was the saviour of the bird.
But man is the dearest creation of God.
So he needs a great saviour.
Our Saviour is Jesus Christ.
He is the Son of God.
Here we will learn about our Saviour.
We will learn now what is written about it in the Holy Bible.
Once, the angel Gabriel appeared before Joseph, the husband of Mary, in his dream.
That son would be named Jesus.
Jesus would free mankind from sin.
Accordingly Joseph accepted Mary.
After the birth of the boy, Joseph named him Jesus.
The Meaning of Jesus and Christ Jesus stands for the Saviour.
Jesus is also called Christ.
The word Christ means one who is anointed with devine blessings.
So, Jesus Christ is the Saviour of all.
He frees us from sins.
The door of heaven was onece closed for us because of the orginal sin.
Jesus has opened that door for us again.
God, the Father anointed Jesus with divine bliss and sent him on the earth.
The door of heaven was thus opened for human beings.
The sin of Adam and Eve polluted all human beings.
But God decided to free human kind from sins.
He sent His only son to this earth.
Jesus Christ died on the Cross and freed mankind from their sins.
So he is the Saviour of human kind.
Helping others in different ways As a doctor, we can cure human body.
But it is Jesus was himself heals the patients through a doctor.
We can advise man to be relieved of his sorrows.
But it is Jesus who relieves people of their sorrows through us.
We can speak of Jesus to people for their spiritual freedom.
Because Jesus free the soul of human beings.
Jesus is our Savior and in him we seek forgiveness of our sins.
